description: The course provides skill development in undertaking medication management reviews, medication dispensing, and management of minor ailments. There is a focus on building and integrating the knowledge and skills from different courses in the pharmacy program and applying these in the optimisation of medicine use in the individual patient. Upon successful completion of the course, students will achieve the Australian Association of Consultant Pharmacy (AACP) Stage One preparatory conditions by graduation. This course commences in week five of the semester.
restricted: Restricted to Bachelor of Pharmacy students
